mapper.select: select role.name from sys_user_role_relation user_role left join sys_role role on user_role.role_id = role.id where user_role.user_id = #{uid} and role.deleted = 0

select user.id as id, user.username as username, user.email as email, user.status as status, resource.borrow_max_num as borrowMaxNum, resource.borrowed_num as borrowedNum from sys_user user left join sys_user_role_relation user_role on user_role.user_id = user.id left join user_resource resource on user.id = resource.user_id where user.deleted = 0 and user_role.role_id = 2
